entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:42 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 06:42 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
